code: import axios from'axios';import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SimulationControl(){const[isRunning,setIsRunning]=useState(false);const handleStart=async()=>{setIsRunning(true);await axios.post('/api/simulation/start',{},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});};const handleStop=async()=>{setIsRunning(false);await axios.post('/api/simulation/stop',{},{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStart,disabled:isRunning,children:"Start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStop,disabled:!isRunning,children:"Stop"})]});}export default SimulationControl;
